features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login, registration, and password recovery flow integrated with Supabase Auth.

features.name: Game Sync (Realtime)
features.description: Real-time synchronization of bingo draws, player statuses, and room states via Supabase Realtime.

features.name: Profile & Assets
features.description: User profile management, including avatar upload to Supabase Storage and BCOINS/BPOINTS tracking.

features.name: Social & Invitations
features.description: Friends system, direct messaging, and room invitations using Postgres changes listeners.

features.name: Store & Transactions
features.description: In-game store for purchasing items with BCOINS, including transaction logging.
